a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(c - (a - b))


# 入力

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

# 計算

x = c - (a - b)

# 出力

print(x)


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
if a >= b:
    print(c - (a - b))
else:
    print(0)


# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2, c = bottle 3
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)


n = int(input())
a = [0] + list(map(int, input().split()))
m = int(input())
for i in range(m):
    l, r = map(int, input().split())
    print(sum(a[l:r+1]))


a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(a - b)


# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2, c = bottle 3
a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())

if b + c + d > a:
    print(b + c + d - a)
else:
    print(0)


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())  # a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b))

# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(c - (a - b) if a - b < c else 0)


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b) if a > b else 0)
